name: Huge BnB Style Bedroom w/Frig/Microwave
description:
This is a HUGE, sunny room –almost as big as a suite – with tall gabled ceilings, lots of light, and beautiful surrounding greenery in a charming, historic William Morris arts and crafts style home that was designed by noted Bay Area architect John Hudson Thomas in 1927 for deans at nearby Mills College.

This is a spacious sanctuary in a semi-urban setting with lots of trees. It comes with a fridge, microwave, electric kettle, and lots of in room amenities so you can self cater. So much charm.
neighborhood_overview:
Millsmont is almost a secret part of Oakland known mostly to locals. It's located on the hillside to the south of Mills College. (It overlooks but is not part of East Oakland, which is further south and to the west.) You can hear the Mills College bells ring each quarter hour.

Our neighbors include a ferry boat captain, a famous Mission mural painter, digital consultants for political campaigns, and a wellness oriented chiropractor.

Almost all of the buildings on our street are single family, middle class homes ($1.1M in the Bay Area) occupied by long time residents. These include Asian, Latino, black, and white residents and families - we are the most ethnically diverse zip code in the Bay Area. You'll see them all walking dogs on the street.

There's a wonderful natural foods grocery store about 10 minutes away by car - Farmer Joe's has two locations. Further away, there are many other great purveyors - Berkeley Bowl and Rockridge Market Hall.
host_about:
I am a writer, content strategist and former documentary filmmaker. Easy going, movie loving, connoisseur of life! 

I also write about organically grown wine and can tell you everywhere to go in wine country. I'm also a former travel writer and know the Bay Area well after living here for 30+ years. 

I'm well traveled, having spent time in India (all over), Italy, Greece, England and France.

host_about: I live in Oakland with my husband and sometimes, our young adult sons.  I love to spend time outside with my family and friends, and love to travel!

name: Modern 2BR in Rockridge / Berkeley, Walkable
description: This is a modern & stylish apartment on a quiet street in Rockridge which is a fantastic neighborhood in Oakland on the Berkeley Border. Remodeled with all the amenities.  Highly walkable! Just 2 blocks to shops, grocers, dining, cafes, bars, parks & more. Short walk to the BART train. This is not someone else's personal apartment so it is not cluttered with personal items.  This is a smoke free, pet free, child friendly home.   We are very experienced at hosting and we aim to please!
neighborhood_overview:
The desirable Rockridge neighborhood is one of the friendliest, safest and most beautiful residential areas in Oakland and is located on the border with Berkeley. The apartment is centrally located, just a couple blocks in either direction to the hip and highly walkable neighborhoods found on College, Claremont and Telegraph Avenues. You will be delighted to find an abundance of local shops, markets, eateries, cafes, pubs, boutiques, parks, playgrounds and more.

Rockridge neighborhood is one of the commercial meccas of Oakland, attracting visitors with its quaint charm, vibrant restaurant scene, and abundant local shops. Spend a day strolling down College Avenue or exploring the nearby residential neighborhoods to soak in the vibes of one of Oakland’s most desirable districts.

name: Charming studio in FAB location!
description: Our  sweet small studio with separate entrance can accommodate two. In sought after Rockridge, on palm-tree lined street,  it's an easy walk to College Avenue filled with local cafes, shops and restaurants.  Just a 10-15 minute walk to BART - easily explore SF.  Simple, clean, charming furnishings.  Lovely patio - dine al fresco!  P.S.  We do not allow smoking inside or anywhere near the property!
neighborhood_overview: We've lived on our street for 32 years. Lovely outlook from our charming studio - palm trees, a beautiful little park across the street.. An easy walk to College Ave shops, award winning restaurants, cafes and the Rockridge BART station. Easy to stay without a car. Our own little piece of heaven!
host_about: My husband, Jim Duffy, and I are avid travelers, who look forward to sharing our own studio with fellow travelers who appreciate charming, clean accommodations in great locations. We've lived on Rockridge Place for 27 years (with a several year stint in Paris) attracted by its walkability to cafés, shops, BART, lovely neighbors, greenery and great weather! We also own several flats in Paris we've had the pleasure of sharing with fellow travelers over the past 12 years. With our children grown and pursuing their own dreams, we thought it a good time to share our own little slice of heaven in Oakland with visitors to our area.
